entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 08:04 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
